question.ques: The ward is facing many challenges due to power shortage. I should approach ________
The sarpanch has considered this issue very critical. He has decides to discuss this issue in the ________
The Government schemes are very helpful, but we will need to generate some more fund. I will generate the funds through ________
The Villagers have come forwarded and given lots of donations. Through their contribution we will be able to generate ________

We have decided to create a ________.With the help of the wind mills we will be able to generate enough electricity to lit the entire village and may be we can lend some to the neighboring villages too. The Village will now become more self sufficient.
